comments:
I have recently installed Eclipse 3.1 on Linux SUSE 9.3 and have encountered a
problem
when trying to "Launch an Eclipse application".
I found a similar bug report(#103763), but I get a different error message from
the log file:

---

...
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError:
/home/holtelu/develop/ws_plugins3.1/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse
Application/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/62/1/.cp/libswt-pi-gtk-3138.so:
/home/holtelu/develop/ws_plugins3.1/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse
Application/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/62/1/.cp/libswt-pi-gtk-3138.so: failed to
map segment from shared object: Operation not permitted
	at java.lang.ClassLoader$NativeLibrary.load(Native Method)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary0(ClassLoader.java:1586)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1495)
	at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:788)
	at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:834)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.gtk.OS.<clinit>(OS.java:19)
...

---

I tried JDK 1.4.2_08-b03 and 1.5.0_03-b07 on SUSE 9.3.
With Eclipse 3.0.2 it is working.

3.0 is loading .so libraries from the plug-ins directory
3.1 is extracting libraris to .metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse 
Application/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/62/1/.cp/ and loading from there.

It looks like a permission problem that disallows the application to load 
libraries from there

That's it.
I moved the workspace from my home directory to /opt/develop. Now I can launch
an Eclipse application without any problem.
So it is not a bug. I tried serveral locations. It seems that I can't launch an
application when the workspace is in my home directory.
I'll try to find the reason for that.

Thanks.

Just a guess that this is some security restriction imposed by selinux you 
might have installed and enabled.

http://www.novell.com/products/linuxpackages/professional/libselinux.html

traces.message: /home/holtelu/develop/ws_plugins3.1/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse Application/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/62/1/.cp/libswt-pi-gtk-3138.so: /home/holtelu/develop/ws_plugins3.1/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Eclipse Application/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/62/1/.cp/libswt-pi-gtk-3138.so: failed to map segment from shared object: Operation not permitted
